name: Riddles For Fun! Trivia Game | Riddles | 5 Questions

questions.text:
I'm neither here nor there, an in-between place.

Bend backwards under bars, I'm a dance with pace.

(Read the hint)

To force out a government, at a stroke, by defeat.

Now add an 'e', I become a car, two people I seat.

(Read the hint)
questions.explanation:
Coupe.

	The first line gives you 'coup'. The second line tells you to add an 'e' giving the solution 'coupe'.

questions.text:
To read me I look different, but when said I sound the same.

Words like herd and heard, see and sea, or even vain and vane.

(Read the hint)

A chronicle of events, in Guinness books I'm found.

An authentic copy, also an archive in sound.

Merriment and insignificant, I'm one word made of two.

Hilarity and paltry, I'm on the screen, in front of you.

(Read the hint)
